content.rendered:
In the summer we thought we would try some new activities – we had the transport and the sun so why not go swimming. We has some real enthusiasm for this one!

A quick trip into town for the purchase of suitable swimming attire, a small pack up (swimming always makes you hungry) and off we went to Yarborough Swimming Pool to join the Over 50’s swim.

Just a small issue when we got in the pool – no one said they couldn’t swim! However, we demonstrated some confident bobbing and walking skills in the pool and enjoyed a good splash. I love my job!

excerpt.rendered: In the summer we thought we would try some new activities – we had the transport and the sun so why not go swimming. We has some real enthusiasm for this one!
